content.rendered:
Oslo, Norway – April 27, 2020:

The Board of Directors of AqualisBraemar ASA has approved the consolidated financial statements, the parent company’s financial statements and the Board of Directors’ report for 2019. There are no material changes compared with the Q4 2019 report released on February 27, 2020.

The Board of Directors will propose to the Annual General Meeting, to be held on June 10, 2020, that a dividend of NOK 0.20 per share will be distributed.

An electronic version of the 2019 annual report will be made available.

For further information, please contact:

Investors and financial media

Kim Boman, CFO, AqualisBraemar ASA
Telephone: +47 959 63 91

Other media enquiries

Endre Johansen, Corporate Communications AS
Telephone: +47 41 61 06 05
Email: endre.johansen@corpcom.no

About AqualisBraemar ASA

AqualisBraemar ASA (OSE: Aqua) is a public listed company that, through its subsidiaries and associates, offers adjusting, marine, offshore and renewables consultancy services to the energy, shipping and insurance industries. The group employs specialist engineers, naval architects, master mariners, loss adjusters and technical consultants in 48 offices located across 5 continents in 31 countries. AqualisBraemar ASA operates under three distinct brands globally:

  • AqualisBraemar: a leading adjusting, marine and offshore consultancy to the energy, shipping and insurance industries
  • AqualisBraemar Yacht Services: a specialised marine consultant to the superyacht market
  • OWC: an independent consultancy to the offshore renewables sector

excerpt.rendered: The Board of Directors of AqualisBraemar ASA has approved the consolidated financial statements, the parent company’s financial statements and the Board of Directors’ report for 2019.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Key information relating to the cash dividend to be paid by AqualisBraemar
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The Board of Directors has decided to propose for the Annual General Meeting a dividend for the fiscal year 2019 of NOK 0.20 per share.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dividend approval and Ex-date
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The Annual General Meeting in AqualisBraemar ASA, held 10 June 2020 at 11am, approved the board proposal of distributing a dividend of NOK 0.20 per share.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Aqualis ASA: Board approves IFRS Financial Statements for 2016
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Oslo, Norway - March 30, 2017: Today the Board of Directors of Aqualis ASA (the "Company") approved the 2016 annual financial statements prepared in accordance with International Financial Reporting Standards ("IFRS"). There are no changes in the income statement or equity compared with the preliminary annual figures disclosed 17 February 2017. The Company…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Aqualis completes acquisition of Braemar Technical Services
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Reference is made to the stock exchange notice dated 13 May 2019 where Aqualis ASA (the “Company”) and Braemar Shipping Services plc (“Braemar”) announced an agreement whereby the Company would acquire three business lines (Adjusting, Marine and Offshore, jointly “BTS”) from Braemar representing the majority of the Braemar Technical Services…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Q4 2019 financial results
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: 2019 was an important and transformative year for AqualisBraemar. The acquisition of Braemar Technical Services roughly doubled the size of the company and improved our offering to our clients, who now benefit from a broader suite of services and increased geographical footprint.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Disclosure of shareholding by primary insider
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Reference is made to the announcement made by AqualisBraemar ASA (the "Company") 14 December 2020, regarding the resolutions passed by an extraordinary general meeting of the Company.
